title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Dvorichna, Synkivka, Petropavlivka and Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviati...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Dvorichna, Synkivka, Petropavlivka and Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Ivanivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
